Package com.team21.attractionsGuide.controller

Class CommentController

java.lang.Object
com.team21.attractionsGuide.controller.CommentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/comments") public class CommentController extends Object
CommentController class handles HTTP requests related to comments

  • Constructor Details

    • CommentController

      public CommentController(CommentService commentService)
      Constructor, injecting the implementation of CommentService as a dependency. By doing this, we can easily swap the implementation of CommentService without modifying the controller code.
      Parameters:
      commentService - the implementation of the CommentService to be used

  • Method Details

    • getComments

      @GetMapping("/") public List<Comment> getComments()
      Handles HTTP GET requests, returning a list of all comment objects. When a client requests the /comments path, this method is called. It uses the injected CommentService instance to fetch the list of comments and returns the list as an HTTP response.
      Returns:
      a list of Comment objects

    • getCommentsByLocationId

      @GetMapping("/{locationId}") public List<Comment> getCommentsByLocationId(@PathVariable("locationId") String locationId) throws CommentWithTheLocationIdNotFoundException
      To return all the comments by location id
      Parameters:
      locationId -
      Returns:
      all the comments by location
      Throws:
      CommentWithTheLocationIdNotFoundException

    • insertComment

      @PostMapping("/") public Comment insertComment(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Comment comment)
